main.description: A reading list item (bookmark) for later reading.

url.description: The URL of the article or page to read.

title.description: The title of the reading item.

description.description: A description or excerpt from the content.

isArchived.description: Whether this item has been read/archived.

archivedAt.description: Timestamp when the item was archived (marked as read).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the item was added to reading list.
